snippet.title: Nightmare Shift Announcement Trailer- Steam Scream Fest 2024
snippet.description:
https://store.steampowered.com/app/3212180/Nightmare_Shift?utm_source=youtube&utm_campaign=steamscreamfest&utm_content=trailer

Nightmare Shift is a psychological horror game that follows a female protagonist who starts a new job as a motel receptionist, only to find her life spiraling into a dark and mysterious reality. As she questions her sanity, she must uncover the truth behind the eerie and abnormal events around her. 

In Nightmare Shift, you play as Emma, a newly hired receptionist at a secluded motel. What starts as a routine job quickly becomes a living nightmare as strange and unsettling events unravel around her. Emma's once-ordinary life descends into chaos, and she begins questioning her sanity as the line between reality and nightmare blurs.

As Emma, you'll explore the dark and eerie motel, uncovering clues and piecing together the mystery behind the terrifying occurrences. The game offers an immersive and shocking story, where every choice you make influences the outcome. With multiple endings based on your decisions, Nightmare Shift challenges you to face your fears and discover the truth behind the darkness that has taken hold of Emma's life.

Game Features:
- This game is primarily a "walking simulator" genre with puzzle-solving elements.
- Psychological horror: The game will drive you insane.
- Immersive experience: An atmospheric, photo-realistic graphics intensifies the horror experience.
- Multiple endings: The game has multiple endings based on your choices.
- Rich story that is inspired by movies like "Door Lock 2018".
